overview: Comic Book hero episode claim, where Delta City PD, OCPs law enforcement prototype robot  elites, de facto fight head to head. Amidst Delta City’s jacked -up, illicit RX pill dealing gang  chaos. Whereby drugs are industrially carted in by the sack load. Flooding Delta sci-fi city’s  gulley scum with illicit currency.  Narrative explainer  Robocops, one black#2 one steel#1. Murphy gets the original Beretta Auto 9 in his mould. The  9mm firing action is factually a hyped event in the gun world. The 9mm was chosen by Murphy,  and not OCP pre-programmed to him, unlike RC#2. He chooses the Auto 9 however, for more  reliability and multi-purpose, indoor tactical accuracy.
title: RoboCop 2
